original_text:
Alkemor’s Tower
La slot Alkemor’s Tower di Betsoft ci porta nel mondo della magia, in cui un mago ha il potere di evocare delle creature fantastiche e potentissime. Una slot che regala molte sorprese, grazie alle sue funzioni speciali che andremo a scoprire in questa recensione. I poteri speciali degli elementi sono così potenti da offrire situazioni vantaggiose e potenziali ottime vincite, oltre ad aumentare di molto l’eccitazione e il divertimento durante il gioco.
Le features degli elementali di Alkemor’s Tower
Un “elementale” è un essere mitologico che appartiene ad uno dei quattro elementi della natura. Qui andiamo a vedere in che modo si rendono protagonisti del gioco. Per evocare un elementale occorre visualizzare un libro nei primi due rulli e un simbolo elementale nel terzo. Nel caso in cui escano libri anche nel quarto e quinto rullo, il potere del simbolo elementale aumenta.
Se il mago Alkemor evoca il potere dell’Acqua, ovvero se nel rullo centrale viene visualizzato il simbolo dell’acqua dopo due libri, tutti i libri presenti sui rulli 2,3,4 e 5 diventano jolly, mentre quello sul rullo 1 viene trasformato in un simbolo pagabile a caso. Le vincite vengono ricalcolate e moltiplicate per il numero di libri e simboli elementali visualizzati.
Nel caso venga evocato il potere della Terra, tutti i libri presenti sui rulli 2, 3, 4 e 5 diventano jolly mentre tutti gli altri simboli vengono distrutti e lasciano spazio ad altri simboli e le vincite vengono ricalcolate.
Con il potere dell’Acqua tutti i libri presenti sui rulli 2, 3, 4 e 5 diventano jolly mentre tutti gli altri simboli volano in un tornado e si riposizionano sul display.
Il potere del Fuoco è bello potente: tutti i libri presenti sui rulli 2, 3, 4 e 5 diventano dei jolly speciali mentre quello sul primo rullo diventa un simbolo pagabile a caso. A questo punto, vengono aggiunti degli extra wild, ovvero degli extra jolly, che saranno aggiunti alle combinazioni vincenti.
Bonus free spin
Con il provider Betsoft i free spin non mancano praticamente mai e la slot Alkemor’s Tower non fa eccezione.
Visualizzando 2 libri blu + 1 libro stretto dalla pianta, si attiva il bonus Nature’s Floor e si ottengono 10, 12 o 15 giri gratis, con simboli speciali e vincite più alte. Inoltre, sul terzo sullo può comparire il simbolo della vite che inghiotte i simboli vicini e li trasforma in premi.
Invece, visualizzando 2 libri blu + 1 libro col sigillo, si attiva il bonus Celestial Floor, con 10, 12 o 15 giri gratis e due buchi neri che possono comparire sui rulli 2 e 4 divorando i simboli vicini e trasformandoli in premi.
Dettagli tecnici
La slot Alkemor’s Tower presenta 243 linee di vincita, poiché valgono tutte le combinazioni purché partano dal primo rullo a sinistra. La percentuale di RTP è pari al 94,96% e il livello di volatilità è medio.

FAQ: Le risposte alle domande più frequenti 
Come si gioca alla slot Alkemor's Tower?

Lo scopo del gioco di Alkemor's Tower è quello di ottenere tre o più simboli uguali partendo dal primo rullo sulla sinistra. Con delle particolari combinazioni si possono attivare funzioni speciali e giri gratis.



Dove posso giocare alla slot Alkemor's Tower per soldi veri?

Per giocare alla slot Alkemor's Tower per denaro vero, si può giocare sui casinò che la presentano in catalogo. Su questa pagina trovi i migliori casinò in cui è possibile giocare a questa slot con soldi veri.



Quali sono le features di Alkemor's Tower?

Tra le features di Alkemor's Tower troviamo le evocazioni degli elementali, che presentano caratteristiche diverse a seconda della creatura evocata, e i bonus free spin ovvero giri gratuiti. Durante i 10 o più giri gratuiti delle funzioni Nature Floor e Celestial Floor vengono visualizzati simboli speciali che offrono premi extra.

raw_translation.response:
Alkemor's Tower
The slot game Alkemor's Tower by Betsoft takes us into the world of magic, where a wizard has the power to summon fantastic and powerful creatures. This slot game offers many surprises, thanks to its special features which we will discover in this review. The special powers of the elements are so potent that they offer advantageous situations and potential great wins, as well as greatly increasing the excitement and fun during the game.

The features of the elementals in Alkemor's Tower
An "elemental" is a mythological being that belongs to one of the four elements of nature. Here we will see how they become protagonists of the game. To summon an elemental, you must display a book on the first two reels and an elemental symbol on the third. If books also appear on the fourth and fifth reels, the power of the elemental symbol increases.

If wizard Alkemor summons the power of Water, that is if the water symbol is displayed on the middle reel after two books, all books on reels 2, 3, 4 and 5 become wild, while the one on reel 1 is transformed into a random paying symbol. The wins are recalculated and multiplied by the number of books and elemental symbols displayed.

If the power of Earth is summoned, all books on reels 2, 3, 4 and 5 become wild while all other symbols are destroyed and leave room for other symbols and wins are recalculated.

With the power of Air, all books on reels 2, 3, 4 and 5 become wild while all the other symbols fly in a tornado and reposition themselves on the display.

The power of Fire is quite strong: all books on reels 2, 3, 4 and 5 become special wilds while the one on the first reel becomes a random paying symbol. At this point, extra wilds are added, i.e. extra wilds, which will be added to the winning combinations.

Free spin bonus
With Betsoft, free spins are practically never lacking, and Alkemor's Tower slot is no exception. By displaying 2 blue books + 1 book squeezed by a plant, the Nature's Floor bonus is activated and you get 10, 12 or 15 free spins with special symbols and higher wins. In addition, the vine symbol may appear on the third reel and swallow nearby symbols, transforming them into prizes.

Instead, by displaying 2 blue books + 1 book with the seal, the Celestial Floor bonus is activated, with 10, 12 or 15 free spins and two black holes that can appear on reels 2 and 4, devouring nearby symbols and transforming them into prizes.

Technical details
Alkemor's Tower slot has 243 paylines, as all combinations are valid as long as they start from the first reel on the left. The RTP percentage is 94.96% and the volatility level is medium.

FAQ: Answers to frequently asked questions
How do you play Alkemor's Tower slot game?

The aim of the Alkemor's Tower game is to obtain three or more identical symbols starting from the first reel on the left. With particular combinations, special features and free spins can be activated.

Where can you play Alkemor's Tower slot for real money?

To play Alkemor's Tower slot for real money, you can play in casinos that have it in their catalogue. On this page, you will find the best casinos where you can play this slot with real money.

What are the features of Alkemor's Tower?

Among the features of Alkemor's Tower are the summoning of elementals, which have different characteristics depending on the creature summoned, and the free spin bonus rounds. During the 10 or more free spin rounds of the Nature Floor and Celestial Floor features, special symbols are displayed that offer extra prizes.

Below is a review of the game "Alkemor’s Tower".

Please provide an FAQ:

- Use simple language and provide practical takeaways.
- Respond with a JSON!
- Use the key "faq" and an array with the keys "question" and "answer". 

Review: Alkemor's Tower

Betsoft's Alkemor's Tower slot takes us into the world of magic where a wizard has the power to evoke fantastic and powerful creatures. This slot provides many surprises, thanks to its special functions that we will discover in this review. The special powers of the elements are so powerful that they offer advantageous situations and potentially excellent winnings, as well as greatly increasing the excitement and enjoyment during gameplay.

The elemental features of Alkemor's Tower

An "elemental" is a mythological being that belongs to one of the four elements of nature. Here we will see how they become the protagonists of the game. To evoke an elemental, a book must be displayed on the first two reels and an elemental symbol on the third. In case books also appear on the fourth and fifth reels, the power of the elemental symbol increases.

If the magician Alkemor evokes the power of Water, i.e. if the water symbol is displayed on the central reel after two books, all books on reels 2, 3, 4, and 5 become wild, while the one on reel 1 is transformed into a randomly payable symbol. The winnings are recalculated and multiplied by the number of books and elemental symbols displayed.

In case the power of Earth is evoked, all books on reels 2, 3, 4, and 5 become wild while all other symbols are destroyed and space is left for other symbols, and the winnings are recalculated.

With the power of Water, all books on reels 2, 3, 4, and 5 become wild while all other symbols fly in a tornado and reposition on the display.

The power of Fire is quite powerful: all books on reels 2, 3, 4, and 5 become special wilds while the one on the first reel becomes a randomly payable symbol. At this point, extra wilds, i.e. extra wilds, are added, which will be added to the winning combinations.

Free spin bonus

With the Betsoft provider, free spins are practically never missing, and the Alkemor's Tower slot is no exception. By displaying 2 blue books + 1 book squeezed by a plant, the Nature's Floor bonus is activated and 10, 12, or 15 free spins are obtained, with special symbols and higher winnings. Also, on the third, the symbol of the vine can appear, swallowing nearby symbols and turning them into prizes.

Instead, by displaying 2 blue books + 1 book with the seal, the Celestial Floor bonus is activated, with 10, 12, or 15 free spins and two black holes that can appear on reels 2 and 4 devouring nearby symbols and turning them into prizes.

Technical details

The Alkemor's Tower slot has 243 paylines, as all combinations are valid as long as they start from the first reel on the left. The RTP percentage is 94.96%, and the level of volatility is medium.

FAQ: Answers to the most frequently asked questions

How to play Alkemor's Tower slot?

The aim of the game of Alkemor's Tower is to obtain three or more identical symbols starting from the first reel on the left. With special combinations, special functions and free spins can be activated.

Where can I play Alkemor's Tower slot for real money?

To play the Alkemor's Tower slot for real money, you can play at casinos that feature it in their catalog. On this page, you will find the best casinos where you can play this slot game for real money.

What are the features of Alkemor's Tower?

Among the features of Alkemor's Tower are the evocations of the elementals, which have different characteristics depending on the creature evoked, and the free spin bonuses that provide extra prizes during the 10 or more free spins of the Nature Floor and Celestial Floor functions.
